forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 39. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Boston, the morning presents a serene clarity, with the sun rising to cast gentle hues across the sky. A refreshing breeze carries a hint of crispness, indicative of the shifting seasons. Today, the temperatures, nearing a modest 60 degrees, will gracefully descend to the low 50s by afternoon, courtesy of a northwest wind that whispers through the trees. The air lacks the dampness of fog, leaving a canvas of blue above where the day's activities can unfold in dry, pleasant comfort.

As the hours roll on, layers will become your ally. A light jacket or sweater will serve well against the cooling afternoon air, enhancing your comfort as you venture outside. Consider a leisurely stroll along the Charles River, or perhaps a quiet meander through one of the city's lovely parks, where the vivid fall foliage can still be savored. As evening approaches, the allure of a cozy café beckons, a place to unwind in the glow of soft lights, perhaps with a warm drink in hand. Embrace this day of serene autumn beauty, where the lingering warmth of the sun dances with the chill of the approaching night.
